definition: Shanlin township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)
Shanlin township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan

sentences.english: Ecosystem made of Picea mongolica is a special sandy forest ecosystem in China.
sentences.chinese: 沙地云杉林是陆地上非常特殊的森林生态系统类型。

sentences.english: Both the groups and individuals of soil animals of Picea and Abies forest were lesser than other communities.
sentences.chinese: 云冷杉林土壤动物类群和个体数量都比其它群落少。

sentences.english: Compared with Picea likiangensis var. linzhiensis community, the species diversity of Cupressus gigantea community was lower.
sentences.chinese: 与林芝云杉林比较，巨柏群落物种多样性偏低。

sentences.english: And residents of the Shanlin Da Ai Community are given some help settling into their new homes.
sentences.chinese: 还有，帮助杉林慈济大爱村的居民熟悉家园的故事。

sentences.english: You've reached the spruce woods earlier than me.
sentences.chinese: 比我还早到，先到云杉林了。

sentences.english: I've just realized that this kind of floral patterns is an abstract image of the spruce tree.
sentences.chinese: 我今天才发现这种花纹简直是云杉林的抽象画。

sentences.english: The rotten degree of fir trees is an important sign of quality of Abies forest.
sentences.chinese: 冷杉林木腐朽程度是冷杉林分质量变化的重要标志。

definition: verdant/lush green and full of life
old growth forest/primary forest/original forest cover
Maolin township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
